item.title: Shrink Huge ibdata1
item.description: Best way is to make one file per table and not use default which baloons to a huge file and never shrinks when some tables are removed and unused. See https://www.thegeekstuff.com/2016/02/mysql-innodb-file-per-table

item.title: [InnoDB] Fatal error: cannot allocate memory for the buffer pool
